page.title: 17Going fishing in Culcheth
page.content: I like going fishing. It's great because you sometimes catch fish and you can even eat some of them. At some places you have to put the fish back in once you have caught them. Most of the time you hardly catch anything but sometimes you do. Near Ratciffe House Farm there is a wood called Crow Wood. In Crow Wood there are five or six deep wide ponds, but you have to be careful near the edge because some are boggy. There is a stream on the edge of Crow Wood where the only thing you might catch is a minnow or a stickleback.{ { { { Jamie Glossop {& {Richard Guest
